oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ISO 25577 MarcXchange schema
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: International Standards Organization
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The MarcXchange schema is an evolution of the MARCXML schema to enable accommodation of different variations of the MARC encoding scheme (e.g. MARC21, UNIMARC, DANMARC, FINMARC etc.)
